wikipedia_page.main: Alfred Horace Thornton (27 January 1853 – 31 March 1906) was an English amateur footballer who played  for England in the first representative international match against Scotland in 1870. By profession, he was a banker.

response: *Alfred Thornton (1853–1906), English footballer in England's first international match against ScotlandHarrow, 1800–1911, p. 407
